text: Soni iyyoyopeyo tuntesile wanganyammwe kuwa nkutula wachilikati kuti m'be mboni pa wandu, nombenajo Ntenga (Muhammadi ï·º) awe mboni pa jamanja, ninganitukutenda ku chibula (cha Baitul Muqaddas) kwamwaliji nkulola, ikaweje kuti tummanyukule mundu jwaakunkuya Ntenga pakunnekanganya nimundu jwaakugalauchila ku indende yakwe, soni chisimu chene (yagalausya chibulayo) yaliji yakusausya kwekulungwa nnope ikaweje kwa wandu wawajongwele Allah, ninganawa Allah jwanti nikonanga chikulupi chenu (pa swala syenu sim'bele n'di nkuswali pakulola ku Baitul Muqaddas), chisimu Allah kwa wandu ni Mpole kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
